ARABIC: وَقَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ يَٰهَٰمَٰنُ ٱبْنِ لِى صَرْحًا لَّعَلِّىٓ أَبْلُغُ ٱلْأَسْبَٰبَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Pharaoh said, 'Haman, build me a tower so that perhaps I may gain means of access,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The Pharaoh said: "O Haman, build me a lofty tower that I may perhaps find the means
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh said: “Haman, build for me a lofty tower that I may scale the highways --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Pharaoh said, "Haman, build a tower of baked bricks for me so that I shall have access.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And said Firaun, “O Haman! Build a high palace for me, in order that I may reach the routes.” –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Fir`awn said: "O Haman! Build me a lofty tower that I may arrive at the ways --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Firon said: O Haman! build for me a tower that I may attain the means of access,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Pharaoh said, 'Haman, build for me a tower, that haply so I may reach the cords,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Pharaoh said: O Haman! Build for me a tower that haply I may reach the roads,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pharaoh said, "O Haman, build for me a lofty building so that I may gain access
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Fir'awn said: O Haman! build for me a tower that haply I may reach the ways of access
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Pharaoh said, ‘O Haman! Build me a tower so that I may reach the routes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Pharaoh said: "O Haman! Build me a lofty palace, that I may attain the ways and means-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Fir'aun (Pharaoh) said: "O Haman! Build me a tower that I may arrive at the ways,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Pharaoh said: 'Haman, build me a tower that I can reach the ways,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Pharaoh said, “O Hamaan, build me a tower, that I may reach the pathways.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Pharaoh said, "O Haman, construct for me a tower that I might reach the ways -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:36]   And Pharaoh said, ‘O Hāmān! Build for me a tower, a lofty edifice, that perhaps I may reach the routes —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Pharaoh said) to his aid: (0 Haman! Build for me a tower that haply I may reach the roads) that I may climb up to the gates,
